sentences.sentence: "Dear sirs, my name is Sam Lee. I think I am the right person for the job," he wrote.
sentences.translation: “尊敬的先生们，我叫萨姆·李。我认为我是这份工作的合适人选。”他写道。

sentences.sentence: Aye, aye! All's well with your house, Sirs, and with the street before it!
sentences.translation: 是呀，是呀！先生们，你们的屋子和面前的这条街都好着呢！

sentences.sentence: And when, Sirs, this pale flame has sprung into the air swaying to every wind, it brings vision to the human eye.
sentences.translation: 先生们，当这簇微弱的火焰在空气中绽放、随风摇曳时，它为人类的眼睛带来了景象。
